creator: sfandino@yahoo.com
text:
the default ssl.conf file, sets a virtual host for _default_:443 that triggers
the assertion on vhost.c line 190:

  file vhost.c, line 190, assertion "rv == APR_SUCCESS" failed

I am using Solaris 9, OpenSSL 0.9.7g, everything compiled with gcc 3.4.1 for 32bits

Cheers

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
Essentially the same problem as bug 27525 -- edit /etc/nsswitch.conf and add
"dns" to the end of the hosts: line to fix it.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 27525 ***
